usefulItems: large non-stick frying pan, bowl, serving bowl, stove top
title: Kheer

ingredients.content: 100 g vermicelli noodles, broken into thirds (see Tips)
edible flowers, for garnishing (optional - see Tips)

preparations.content: Place vermicelli into mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>.
Place a non-stick frying pan over low-medium heat. Place vermicelli noodles into pan and toast until nearly golden in colour (see Tips). Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place milk, sugar, cardamom pods and rosewater into mixing bowl and cook <b>5 min/90°C//speed 2<b>, then cook <b>40 min/80°C//speed 2<b>.

Add saffron, condensed milk and toasted vermicelli and cook <b>35 min/90°C//speed 2<b> <b>, without measuring cup<b>. Transfer into a serving bowl and allow to cool to room temperature. Garnish with pistachios, edible gold leaf (optional) and edible flowers (optional) before serving.

hintsAndTricks: To ensure your recipe is gluten free, always check the labels of your products to make sure they don't contain traces of wheat or gluten.
Take care when toasting your noodles as burnt noodles will affect the flavour of the dish.
You can purchase edible flowers from gourmet food stores or online. Make sure to only use non-sprayed flowers.
